cases.title: Meta Platforms Inc. v. Federal Trade Commission - Data Transfer Restrictions
cases.court: U.S. Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit
cases.description: FTC lawsuit challenging Meta's data transfer practices following Cambridge Analytica scandal aftermath and EU-US Data Bridge agreement
cases.summary: Major FTC lawsuit challenging Meta's data transfer practices and privacy compliance

cases.title: OpenAI v. Authors Guild - Copyright Infringement in AI Training
cases.court: U.S. District Court, Northern District of California
cases.description: Class-action lawsuit alleging copyright infringement by OpenAI's use of copyrighted literary works in training large language models
cases.summary: Landmark copyright case involving AI training data and fair use doctrine

cases.title: European Commission v. TikTok - Children's Privacy Violations
cases.court: Court of Justice of the European Union
cases.description: EC lawsuit over alleged violations of GDPR and new Digital Services Act provisions related to children's privacy protection
cases.summary: EU legal action against TikTok for children's privacy violations

cases.title: Uber Technologies Inc. v. Independent Drivers Guild - Gig Worker Benefits
cases.court: U.S. District Court, Southern District of New York
cases.description: Class action regarding driver benefits, working conditions, and classification of rideshare drivers under new state gig economy legislation
cases.outcome: Partial settlement reached with new benefit requirements
cases.summary: Settled case establishing new benefit requirements for gig workers

cases.title: Samsung Electronics Co. v. US International Trade Commission - Patent Dispute
cases.court: U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit
cases.description: Patent dispute involving semiconductor manufacturing technologies and trade secret claims related to advanced chip fabrication
cases.summary: Complex patent dispute with international trade implications

cases.title: Indonesia Ministry of Communication v. Global Tech Platforms - Data Localization
parties: Ministry of Communication and Information Technology, Indonesia, Plaintiff
Google LLC, Microsoft Corporation, Apple Inc., Defendants
cases.description: Government enforcement action for non-compliance with Indonesia's data localization requirements under the Personal Data Protection Law
cases.summary: Indonesian government action on data localization compliance

cases.title: Vietnam Ministry of Industry and Trade v. Amazon.com Inc. - E-commerce Regulations
cases.court: Commercial Court, Ho Chi Minh City
parties: Ministry of Industry and Trade, Vietnam, Plaintiff
cases.description: Enforcement action regarding Vietnam's e-commerce regulations, tax compliance, and local business registration requirements for foreign platforms
cases.summary: Vietnamese regulatory action against Amazon for e-commerce compliance

cases.title: Philippines Department of Labor v. Food Delivery Apps - Gig Worker Rights
cases.court: Labor Arbiter, National Capital Region, Philippines
parties: Department of Labor and Employment, Philippines, Plaintiff
Grab Holdings Inc., Foodpanda Singapore Pte Ltd., Defendants
cases.description: Labor department investigation into working conditions and benefit provision for food delivery riders amid new Philippine gig economy regulations
cases.summary: Philippine labor action on gig worker rights and benefits
